Message:
After passing God’s judgement
for days on end...
a glimmer of light
appeared before me.
It was...
Florence...

Standing next to her
was a man I did not recognize...

The light that poured from
his staff purged every one of
my swords from the land.

He was like
a messenger from God...

Bathing in his light
finally freed me from my trial.
Then, everything became clear.

The girl who kept reaching out
to me despite all the pain
her body was in...
was the girl I know and love.
My dearest friend...
I’m so sorry...

You came, fighting to save me
till you could barely stand,
yet I doubted you.
I said that you betrayed me...!

Even though I vowed to
believe you no matter what...!
But,

we will never be
torn apart again...

This bond between us
has gotten so strong that
even God Himself cannot
sever it.
After all,
you are...
<ct=3000>my dear knight</ct>.
